hero.title: Your fuel delivered
hero.description: Order fuel for your car, home, or business with a click. Our expert team delivers fuel quickly and safely to any location.

services.title: Our Complete Services
services.subtitle: We provide a complete range of fuel services to meet all your needs

carFuel.title: Car Fuel Delivery
carFuel.description: We deliver fuel to your car anywhere, anytime. Just specify your location and we come to you.

homeFuel.title: Home Fuel Delivery
homeFuel.description: Home fuel delivery service for generators and household use in quantities that suit your needs.

businessFuel.title: Business Fuel Delivery
businessFuel.description: Complete fuel solutions for companies and factories at competitive prices with reliable service.

emergency.title: Emergency Services
emergency.description: 24/7 emergency service for cars that run out of fuel on the road.

app.title: Smart App
app.description: Easy-to-use app that allows you to order fuel, track your orders, and manage your payments.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: We guarantee fuel delivery to you as quickly as possible with a trained team and advanced equipment.

appDemo.title: Our Premium App
appDemo.description: Download the FuelExpress app for an easier and faster fuel ordering experience. Track your orders in real time, order easily, and pay securely through the app.
appDemo.feature1: Quick order in less than a minute
appDemo.feature2: Live tracking of fuel truck location

cta.title: Ready to order your fuel?
cta.description: Join thousands of customers who trust us for fast and safe fuel delivery.

footer.about: We provide innovative and fast fuel solutions to meet your needs wherever you are. Quality, safety, and speed in delivery.
